<title level="1" right="Action">[Covered Reload](/Actions.aspx?ID=914) <actions string="Single Action" /></title>

<traits>
<trait label="Gunslinger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=406" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 109 <sup>2.0</sup>

</column>

---

You duck into a safe position or minimize your profile while reloading to make your next attack. Either [Take Cover](/Actions.aspx?ID=90) or attempt to [Hide](/Actions.aspx?ID=62), then Interact to reload. As normal, you must meet the requirements to Take Cover or Hide; you must be [prone](/Conditions.aspx?ID=31), benefiting from cover, or near a feature that allows you to Take Cover, and you need to be benefiting from cover or [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4) to a creature to Hide from that creature.
name: Covered Reload
